extension.description: VU+ frontend; supporting streaming of Live TV & Recordings, EPG, Timers. For parsing the XML output from the VU+ webinterface it uses the xmlParser library developed by Frank Vanden Berghen (http://www.applied-mathematics.net/tools/xmlParser.html). Many thanks for this!
